title: *************Philadelphia, PA 19106********
description:
210 Locust St, Philadelphia, PA 19106
Have you been looking for a home or pied a terre in Center City in a location that feels secluded and still offers the conveniences of a city home?  West in Society Hill Towers is your answer,  This southwesterly facing corner home with fantastic views offers a view of the Center City skyline where you will watch the sun setting, and the north view facing the United States Customs House and the entire historic area of our beautiful Society Hill and Old City.  You even have a partial view of the Ben Franklin Bridge. This home features hardwood flooring and decorative wainscoting in the entry foyer which opens to a galley kitchen with floor to ceiling window, and the living room/dining combination with six I.M.Pei designed floor to ceiling corner windows which will make you feel like you are living in your own glass world high in the sky.  The kitchen has been totally renovated with pendant lighting, stainless appliances and some glass fronted cabinetry as well as a breakfast bar that seats four. The bedroom has two additional floor to ceiling windows and the renovated full bathroom is located directly outside of the bedroom.  The 24 hour door person Society Hill Towers has a beautiful in ground swimming pool and grilling area, a fitness room, underground parking (available at additional fees) and an on site  convenient food market as well as being home to the James Beard Award winning Zahav Restaurant.  You are steps from the Landmark movie theaters, tons of delicious restaurants, and a block or two from the weekly farmers market in HeadHouse Square.

title: Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renova
description:
Inspired from the town of Tulum, Vesset Capital Partners brings you a tranquil and trendy renovation. Move right into this absolutely gorgeous, 2 bed, 2.5 bath newly renovated GRADUATE HOSPITAL townhome! This home is light-filled and contemporary with an eye-catching facade, custom wooden slat staircase, hardwood flooring, exposed brick accent walls, and a spacious back patio with in-ground garden beds. A bright open floor plan greets you as you enter the home, and the slatted wood staircase really defines the living room and gives a boho vibe. Heading past the living room you'll find a dining space, half bath with barn door and stylist wall paper and an eat-in kitchen. The kitchen features a breakfast bar, two toned flat panel cabinets, black cabinet pulls and faucet, quartz countertops, marble backsplash, and upgraded stainless steel appliances including a 6-range burner and a smart fridge. The dining room and kitchen feel fresh and airy with south-facing windows and access to the back patio with garden beds and modern privacy fencing. Head to the second floor for 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. The two nicely sized bedrooms feature great closet space and natural and recessed lighting. The primary bedroom is complete with built-in storage next to the ensuite bath and a unique cutout by the window, perfect for plants. Both full bathrooms feature custom floor and shower tiling, a rain shower head in the primary bathroom, vanity storage, and a waterfall sink faucet. The second bedroom features exposed brick and ample windows. Need extra room? The fully finished basement is ideal for an additional living area, playroom, gym, or home office with storage along with a washer/dryer. This GRADUATE HOSPITAL location is amazing. You have groceries, fitness, parks, hot spot cafes, and restaurants all within walking distance. Sprouts Farmers Market, Dock Street Brewing, L’Anima BYO, Target, Marian Anderson Recreation Center, Schuylkill River Boardwalk, Fitzwater Street Philly Bagels, Founding Fathers Sports Bar & Grill, and more are within a mile of home. Plus, access to major highways, public transportation, and Center City is easy. Want to see this in person? Schedule your showing today!
1516 Montrose St

title: Skyline Views From Spacious 3 Bedroom in Rittenhouse
description:
Great opportunity to rent a beautiful 3 bedroom and 2.5 bath home with large outdoor space and an amazing location! Just a few blocks from Rittenhouse Square and conveniently located near many restaurants, bars, coffee shops, gym, shopping options on South St. Easy access to public transportation.
This home offers a large eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, plenty of cabinet space, small powder room/ laundry area with stackable washer/dryer and a storage closet. Main level features spacious living/dining area with exposed brick, gas fireplace, closet and an entrance to a bi-level backyard/deck. Second floor master bedroom comes with lots of closet space and an ensuite newly renovated full bathroom with a tub and double sinks.
Third floor has additional 2 bedrooms, and a full newly renovated bathroom. 3rd bedroom is small, would be great as an office, a den or a nursery. There is also an access to a large roof deck with city skyline views through the front bedroom. Front bedroom is small, can be perfect for an office or a nursery. Home has hardwood floors throughout, beautiful open stairs with new iron railings, exposed brick and a lot of character.
No Pets
Listing courtesy of Keller Williams Philadelphia

title: HOUSE FOR RENT
description: 346 Fitzgerald St is an updated 2 bed, 1 bath home with a rear patio, semi-finished basement, and central a/c. Sat on a quiet Whitman block, a handsome red brick facade greets you out front. Inside, a foyer leads to the open and airy main level. Original hardwood floors extend from the sun-lit living room into the large dining area, anchored by an exposed brick wall. The bright kitchen is fitted with plenty of storage space and newer floors. Out back, you'll find an expansive patio perfect for hosting summer barbecues or relaxing with a morning cup of coffee. On the home's second level, there's a large bedroom with two tall windows, a ceiling fan, and excellent closet space at the front. There's another bedroom at the center and a modern full bathroom at the rear. Completing the home is a semi-finished basement that's ideal for a gym and extra storage. Highlights of this meticulously maintained home include newer windows, a water heater, and HVAC, along with all appliances being included with the sale. In addition to everything inside, 346 Fitzgerald St earns a WalkScore of 87! Snyder Ave and E Moyamensing Ave, both lined with popular restaurants and friendly shops, are just a few blocks away. Burke Playground and Mifflin Square Park are also a quick stroll, and nearby shopping on Delaware Ave includes Target, Acme, Wine & Spirits, Ikea, and Lowes. Plus, there's easy access to public transit, the stadium district, I-95, and South Jersey via I-76.

title: unique home you have been looking for 2bed 1 bath
description: Every once in a while a truly special home comes on the market, something not like every other home. Well, 33 Shawnee Trail is that home! Nestled serenely on a wooded lot in the quaint neighborhood of Shawnee Woods in Shamong is the unique home you have been looking for. Most of the interior has just been freshly painted a neutral, inviting grey. All of the carpet has also just been replaced along the stairs and in the bedroom areas. Everything has been taken care of so you can move right in! The vivid front door is a delightful compliment to the exterior color of the home, which blends perfectly with the wooded yard. Inside, the open 2-story foyer offers a welcome area to greet friends and family. The floating staircase, open hallway for the upper floor with a wall of windows make this foyer so warm and inviting . To the right is a private living room area with gorgeous hardwood floors and a large window streaming warm sunlight throughout the day.********* If you're interested Can you Tell me your name and number so that we can communicate.************
